snippet: Amazon's Kindle software keeps track of where you left off in the same e-book on all your tablets and phones, but you can clear the information if it gets out of sync.
abstract: Amazon's Kindle software keeps track of where you left off in the same e-book on all your tablets and phones, but you can clear the information if it gets out of sync.

headline.main: Q&A: Resetting a Kindle's Automatic Bookmark
